Larry Page Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity-we are only at the beginning and I can't wait to get started. Richardson ) In his career as an engineer in California and Colorado, Ken Brisco often spent time as a math tutor for kids. Bernie Sanders praised the president's take on a wide range of issues that the Independent routinely fights for. The president covered a lot of territory tonight but the issues that stand out for me are the need for our nation to rebuild our crumbling infrastructure and create millions of new jobs, reduce our deficit in a fair and responsible way, and for us to make sure that Social Security remains strong not only for the present generation but for our kids and grandchildren, Bernie Sanders said. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
